alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 15 at 2:30AM EST until January 16 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Glades and Hendry Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Frost Advisory, from 3 AM to 8 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
